docs.lead_paragraph: Gains among blacks and Puerto Ricans drove infant mortality rates to a record low in New York City last year, city officials reported Thursday.

headline.main: Infant Mortality Is Decreasing in Puerto Ricans and Blacks
headline.print_headline: Infant Mortality Is Decreasing In Puerto Ricans And Blacks

docs.snippet: Gains among blacks and Puerto Ricans drove infant mortality rates to a record low in New York City last year, city officials reported Thursday.
